```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(readr)
library(ggpointdensity)
library(viridis)
library(tidyr)
library(fitdistrplus)
```

```{r}
head(POI1)
head(POI2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(POI1, aes(x,y))+ geom_point(shape = ".") + geom_density2d() + coord_fixed()
ggplot(POI2, aes(x,y))+ geom_point(shape = ".") + geom_density2d() + coord_fixed()
```

```{r}
#setting up lines

line0 <- POI2 %>%
  filter(y>4048.5 & y< 4049.5)
line1 <- POI2 %>%
  filter(y>4049.5 & y< 4050.5)
line2 <- POI2 %>%
  filter(y>4050.5 & y< 4051.5)
line3 <- POI2 %>%
  filter(y>4051.5 & y< 4052.5)
line4 <- POI2 %>%
  filter(y>4052.5 & y< 4053.5)
line5 <- POI2 %>%
  filter(y>4053.5 & y< 4054.5)
line6 <- POI2 %>%
  filter(y>4054.5 & y< 4055.4)

#historgrams
plotdist(line0$x)
plotdist(line1$x)
plotdist(line2$x)
plotdist(line3$x)
plotdist(line4$x)
plotdist(line5$x)
plotdist(line6$x)

```
